name: amongus-8004
description: Among Us game using ERC-8004 and A2A protocol

scripts.deploy: sh -c 'if [ "${NODE_ENV:-local}" = local ]; then bun run scripts/deploy-contracts.ts; elif [ "$NODE_ENV" = testnet ]; then bash scripts/deploy-contracts-testnet.sh && bash scripts/deploy-server-railway.sh testnet; else bash scripts/deploy-contracts-prod.sh && bash scripts/deploy-server-railway.sh production; fi'
scripts.verify: sh -c 'if [ "${NODE_ENV:-testnet}" = production ]; then bash scripts/verify-deployment.sh production; elif [ "$NODE_ENV" = testnet ]; then bash scripts/verify-deployment.sh testnet; else echo "No verification for local"; fi'
